name: Greater Blighted Critical

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Blighted Critical, Critical Focus, caster level 12th.

sections.text: Whenever you confirm a critical hit with a touch spell, ranged touch spell, or spell-like ability against an opponent, the victim gains a random major spellblight.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: You can only apply the effects of one critical feat to a given critical hit unless you possess Critical Mastery.
sections.name: Special

description: Your critical hit from a spell or spell-like ability afflicts the target with a major spellblight.
